TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueSource extends System.ValueType

span.span: Reports the information returned from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介绍的大多数信息的传输中包含属性。Most of the information that transmits is contained in the property. 此属性包含一个枚举值，指定的整体恰好一个方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，它负责的依赖项属性的有效值。This property contains an enumeration value that specifies exactly one aspect of the overall [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system that is responsible for the effective value of a dependency property. 除了基础值，可能需要关注有关依赖项属性值的其他信息是是否值进行动画处理，以及是否值涉及到 （如绑定或动态资源引用） 的表达式。Besides the base value, the other information that might be interesting about a dependency property value is whether the value is being animated, and whether the value involves an expression (such as a binding, or a dynamic resource reference). 此信息报告的和分别。This information is reported by and respectively. 此外，如果对属性值执行强制，属性将保留所需的值，并且属性值将尝试达到该预期的值，如果更改或提升的特定强制约束。Also, if coercion is acting on a property value, the property retains a desired value, and the property value will attempt to reach that desired value if the constraints of the specific coercion are changed or lifted. 一个强制转换后的属性，其预期值不会将报告是`true`。A coerced property that is not at its desired value will report that is `true`.

Public ReadOnly Property BaseValueSource As BaseValueSource

summary.span: Gets a value of the enumeration, which reports the source that provided the dependency property system with a value.

span.span: Gets a value of the enumeration, which reports the source that provided the dependency property system with a value.
A value of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果强制或动画行动的属性上，基础值不是有效的值。The base value is not the effective value if either coercion or animation is acting on the property. 检查和如果你想要确定基的值是否为有效的值。Check and if you want to determine whether the base value is the effective value. 你可能还想要检查若要查看是否基的值计算出表达式。You might also want to check to see if the base value was evaluated out of an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持基于每个每个属性值的值是否相等结构。This implementation supports value equality, based on each of the property values of each structure.

summary.span: Gets a value that declares whether the property is being animated.

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether the property is being animated.

value.span: 如果该属性进行动画处理;，否则为。

span.span: if the property is animated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于当前进行动画处理的任何属性，源报告的没有立即关系，因为动画运行的依赖项属性优先权要高于基础值。For any property that is currently being animated, the source reported by is not immediately relevant, because the animation operates at higher dependency property precedence than the base value. 有关优先级和动画的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information about precedence and animations, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

member this.IsCoerced : bool

summary.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property.

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property.

value.span: 如果值导致的实现应用于依赖项属性; 否则为。

span.span: if the value resulted from a implementation applied to a dependency property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对属性值执行强制，属性将保留所需的值，并且属性值将尝试达到该预期的值，如果更改或提升的特定强制约束。If coercion is acting on a property value, the property retains a desired value, and the property value will attempt to reach that desired value if the constraints of the specific coercion are changed or lifted. 一个强制转换后的属性，其预期值不会将报告是`true`。A coerced property that is not at its desired value will report that is `true`. 强制在优先权要高于基础值，作用和严格来说不是如何设置基础值的参与者。Coercion acts at higher precedence than the base value, and is not strictly speaking a participant in how the base value is set. 因此会报告的并且被强制状态，按此属性，而不是值为枚举。Therefore the state of being coerced is reported by this property, rather than by a value of the enumeration. 强制转换、 基础值和优先级有关的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information about coercion, base values, and precedence, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

summary.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from an evaluated expression.

span.span: Gets a value that declares whether this value resulted from an evaluated expression.

summary.span: This might be a supporting a binding, or an internal expression such as those that support the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

span.span: This might be a supporting a binding, or an internal expression such as those that support the [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension.md).

value.span: 如果值来自计算的表达式;否则为。

span.span: if the value came from an evaluated expression; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算的表达式还会报告设置条件表达式已应用，为中的值的特定基值。An evaluated expression will also report the specific base value setting condition where the expression was applied, as a value in . 仍是非常适用于任何属性其中是`true`。The is still very relevant for any property where is `true`. 了解通过表达式是否提供一个值可以设置值间接，例如根据通过模板或继承的属性值的情况特别有用。Knowing whether a value came through an expression can be particularly useful if the value was set indirectly, such as through a template or an inherited property value. 如果无法计算表达式 （绑定失败; 找不到该名称的资源），则值将来自在属性系统中，最可能的一些其他参与者的默认值。If an expression fails to evaluate (the binding failed; no resource of that name was found), then the value will come from some other participant in the property system, most likely the default value. 该源然后中报告。That source is then reported in . 将返回失败的表达式计算`false`为。Failed expression evaluations will return `false` for .
